Component.Name: VaconMarineAppFCC6
Component.Description: Interfaces a Vacon FC with Marine Application, using OPT-C6 CANopen option board.

Signal.Description: Selects which StartFunction the drive shall use . 0=Ramp, 1=FlyingStart
Signal.Name: StartFunction

Signal.Description: Selects which StopFunction the drive shall use . 0=Coasting, 1=Ramp
Signal.Name: StopFunction

Signal.Description: Fault bit from drive status word
Signal.Name: FaultBit

Signal.Description: Warning bit from drive status word
Signal.Name: WarningBit

Signal.Description: If parameter CheckAlternativeParameters is set, correct set of alternative parameters will be transferred depending on value of this signal.
Signal.Name: EnableAlternativeParameters

Alarm.Description: Alarm is triggered (with Text containing the list of errors) when some node of the component (like operator) has configuration fault.
Alarm.Name: ConfigurationFaults

Alarm.Description: High temperature on motor X winding 1
Alarm.ErrorHighLevelText: Critical temperature on motor X winding 1
Alarm.ErrorLowLevelText: Freezing temp on motor X winding 1
Alarm.Name: MotorTemp1
Alarm.Text: High temperature on motor X winding 1
Alarm.WarningHighLevelText: High temperature on motor X winding 1
Alarm.WarningLowLevelText: Low temp on motor X winding 1

Alarm.Description: High temperature on motor X winding 2
Alarm.ErrorHighLevelText: Critical temperature on motor X winding 2
Alarm.ErrorLowLevelText: Freezing temp on motor X winding 2
Alarm.Name: MotorTemp2
Alarm.Text: High temperature on motor X winding 2
Alarm.WarningHighLevelText: High temperature on motor X winding 2
Alarm.WarningLowLevelText: Low temp on motor X winding 2

Alarm.Description: High temperature on motor X winding 3
Alarm.ErrorHighLevelText: Critical temperature on motor X winding 3
Alarm.ErrorLowLevelText: Freezing temp on motor X winding 3
Alarm.Name: MotorTemp3
Alarm.Text: High temperature on motor X winding 3
Alarm.WarningHighLevelText: High temperature on motor X winding 3
Alarm.WarningLowLevelText: Low temp on motor X winding 3

Alarm.Description: Drive is given run command, but is not running
Alarm.Name: NotRunning

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 1 selection (TPDO21 byte 5-6). ID 65 = FBStatusWord. (default ID 1 Output Frequency).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 1 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 2 selection (TPDO21 byte 7-8). ID 1170 = Shaft Rounds (default ID 2 Motor Speed).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 2 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 3 selection (TPDO22 byte 1-2). ID 7 = DC Link voltage (default ID 45 Motor Current to FB).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 3 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 4 selection (TPDO22 byte 3-4). ID 4 = Motor Torque (default ID 4 Motor Torque).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 4 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 5 selection (TPDO22 byte 5-6). ID 56 = Din Status Word (default ID 5 Motor Power).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 5 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data out 6 selection (TPDO22 byte 7-8). ID 37 = Last Active Fault (default ID 6 Motor Voltage).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data Out 6 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 1 selection (RPDO21 byte 5-6). ID 1140 = FB Torque Reference (default ID 1140 FB Torque Reference).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 1 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 2 selection (RPDO21 byte 7-8). ID 1287 = Torque Limit Motoring (default ID 46 FB Limit Scaling).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 2 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 3 selection (RPDO22 byte 1-2). ID 1288 = Torque Limit Generatoring (default ID 47 FB Adjust Reference).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 3 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 4 selection (RPDO22 byte 3-4). ID 1289 = Power Limit Motoring (default ID 48 FB Analogue Output).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 4 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 5 selection (RPDO22 byte 5-6). ID 1290 = Power Limit Generatoring (default ID 0 not used).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 5 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: Fieldbus data in 6 selection (RPDO22 byte 7-8). ID 0 = Not used (default ID 0 not used).
VaconParameter.Name: FB Data In 6 Sel

VaconParameter.Description: General Status Word selection. 64=MC Status.
VaconParameter.Name: GSW ID

VaconParameter.Description: Actual Speed shown on fieldbus. 0=Calculated, 1=Actual.
VaconParameter.Name: ActualSpeedShown

VaconParameter.Description: Profibus Mode: 1=Standard, 2=ProfiDrive.
VaconParameter.Name: Profibus Mode

VaconParameter.Description: The drooping function enables speed drop as a function of load. This parameter sets the value corresponding to the nominal torque of the motor.
VaconParameter.Name: Load Drooping

VaconParameter.Description: Control location: 0=I/O Terminal, 2=Keypad, 3=Fieldbus.
VaconParameter.Name: Control Place

VaconParameter.Description: Defines how the drive should start 0=Ramp, 1=Flying start.
VaconParameter.Name: Start Function

VaconParameter.Description: Defines how the drive should stop. 0=Coast, 1=Ramp.
VaconParameter.Name: Stop Function

VaconParameter.Description: 0=OL FreqCtrl, 1=OL SpeedCtrl, 2=OLSpeed/Torq, 3=CL SpeedCtrl, 4=CLSpeed/Torq.
VaconParameter.Name: Motor Ctrl Mode

VaconParameter.Description: Select the Master Follower mode. When the drive is a follower, the Run Request command is monitored from Master but all references are selectable by parameters.
VaconParameter.Name: Master Follower Mode

VaconParameter.Description: Time from zero to max speed.
VaconParameter.Name: Accel Time 1

VaconParameter.Description: Time from max to zero speed.
VaconParameter.Name: Decel Time 1

VaconParameter.Description: Closed loop ramp generator follows encoder speed.
VaconParameter.Name: CLRampFollowEncoderFreq

Parameter.Description: Invert direction of speed and torque
Parameter.Name: InvertDirection

Parameter.Description: Motor nominal speed (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomSpeed

Parameter.Description: Motor nominal frequency (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomFreq

Parameter.Description: Motor nominal current (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomCurrent

Parameter.Description: Nominal motor power (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomPower

Parameter.Description: Motor nominal cosinus phi (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomCosPhi

Parameter.Description: Motor nominal voltage (from motor rating plate)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomVoltage

Parameter.Description: Nominal torque of motor (from motor data sheet)
Parameter.Name: MotorNomTorque

Parameter.Description: Set EnableDebugOverride parameter to 471 to write cw_bXX bits to the control word, and also set FBSpeedRef=SpeedRef .
Parameter.Name: EnableDebugOverride

Parameter.Description: Motor efficiency (from data sheet)
Parameter.Name: MotorEfficiency

Parameter.Description: Used to scale SpeedRef to %, so this signal must have same unit as SpeedRef
Parameter.Name: MotorMaxSpeed

Parameter.Description: Disable the drive. Prevents it from being used in case of motor failure etc.
Parameter.Name: DisableDrive

Parameter.Description: Filter order of ActualTorque filter
Parameter.Name: ActualTorqueFilterOrder

Parameter.Description: Corner frequency of ActualTorque low-pass filter
Parameter.Name: ActualTorqueFilterCornerFreq

Parameter.Description: Set to 1 to ignore status of AFE.
Parameter.Name: IgnoreAFEStatus

Parameter.Description: Time FaultDelayed will be delayed before switching OFF.
Parameter.Name: FaultDelayOff

Parameter.Description: Divisor to slow down watchdog toggling. 0=disable wathcdog.
Parameter.Name: WatchdogDivisor

Parameter.Description: If 1, a ResetFault message is required to clear the fault in the drive
Parameter.Name: ManualFaultReset

Parameter.Description: If enabled, will check input signal EnableAlternativeParameters and transfer parameters accordingly
Parameter.Name: CheckAlternativeParameters

Parameter.Description: Original value for AccelTime1 and DecelTime1. Transferred if CheckAlternativeParameters=1 and EnableAlternativeParameters=0.
Parameter.Name: RampOrig

Parameter.Description: Alternative value for AccelTime1 and DecelTime1. Transferred if CheckAlternativeParameters=1 and EnableAlternativeParameters=1.
Parameter.Name: RampAlt

Parameter.Description: Original value for CLRampFollowEncoderFreq. Transferred if CheckAlternativeParameters=1 and EnableAlternativeParameters=0.
Parameter.Name: CLRampFollowEncFreqOrig

Parameter.Description: Original value for CLRampFollowEncoderFreq. Transferred if CheckAlternativeParameters=1 and EnableAlternativeParameters=1.
Parameter.Name: CLRampFollowEncFreqAlt
